DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety three 8-week course treatment LIPO-202 non-obese patient central abdominal bulging . Efficacy measurement also collect .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Study Evaluate Retreatment With LIPO-202
DOC.criteria: Provided consent Healthy male nonpregnant female subject BMI < 30 kg/m2 Stable diet exercise routine Central abdominal bulging least `` Slight Bulge , Not Flat '' Have treatment fat around abdomen , include surgical procedure ( tummy tuck , liposuction ) , injection fat loss treatment device reduce fat abdomen Plan start weight loss exercise program study . Be woman pregnant , breast feeding , baby within 6 month and/or use appropriate birth control . Known hypersensitivity study drug Prior current enrollment Neothetics ( formerly Lithera ) study involve LIPO102 LIPO202
